entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What kind of SSL/TLS certificate is being used for dotnet sdk check? #69633
  • [API Proposal]: Non-cooperative abortion of code execution #69622
  • JIT: another case of bad interaction of GDV and boxing #69621
    6.0.x
  • [Uri] Absolute paths using UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute parsed as relative on iOS and Android #69618
  • Consider propagating regex comments to source-generated code #69616
    Future
  • Update XML docs for `IntPtr` and `UIntPtr` #69614
  • Unexpected JIT helper in TreatAsHasRetBufArg #69612
    7.0.0
  • Is runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.ObjWriter necessary for source-build? #69611
  • Records with framework multi-targeting throw System.TypeLoadException #69610
  • LibraryImport generated code feedback #69608
    7.0.0
  • create-mibc with spgo on Linux #69607
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add remaining APIs to complete NativeMemory set #69606
  • [API Proposal]: [ReadOnly]Memory<T> lifetime / pooling considerations #69605
  • Using File.Exists to check the pipe created will make the NamedPipeClientStream connect fail #69604
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for XML serialization callbacks #69602
  • [Android] Uncaught exception crashes an app without printing correct stack trace #69601
  • [API Proposal]: Proxy (HTTP, HTTP tunnel, Socks) support at the Socket level #69595
  • [wasm][debugger] Add onFrameCall evaluation of static members of non-static class #69594
  • Internal CLR error while ILC.exe compiling Microsoft.CSharp in multifile mode #69593
  • [API Proposal]: Equivalent of Path.IsPathRooted for directory traversal prevention #69591
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException helper methods #69590
  • Codegen for `value ? stackalloc byte[c1] : stackalloc byte[c2]` vs `stackalloc byte[value ? c1 : c2]` #69589
    Future
  • Test failure: Build failed during "Copy native test components to test output folder" in /Users/runner/work/1/s/dotnet.sh #69588
  • Test failure: JIT\opt\Tailcall\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix\TailcallVerifyWithPrefix.cmd #69587
    7.0.0

Closed

  • EMSDK-.WasmNativeDefaultsTests work item failing #67887
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests remove the *emsdk* run #58159
    7.0.0
  • Continuous Integration Issue #69586
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tests.Perf_ThreadPool on arm64 #69258
  • .NET 4.8 - TLS / SCHANNEL / UseStrongCrypto #61739
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Exposing the total paused duration in GC. #66036
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes fails on devices #60581
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes fail on OSX #68293
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Shouldn't see an integer typed GT_MOD node in ARM64"' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #68470
    7.0.0
  • Update references to helix queues that are going to be removed at the end of March #65033
  • [wasm] Random crash in wasm with emscripten 2.0.34 and higher #65705
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] AOT failure in System.Diagnostics tests. #57003
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Failure in System.Linq.Expressions #57004
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide `BSTR` marshaller for `LibraryImport` source generator #69021
    7.0.0
  • Provide a version of Stream.Read that reads as much as possible #16598
    7.0.0
  • Allow JsonExtensionData on Records #69123
  • System.Text.Json.JsonException: '0xE9' is an invalid start of a value. Path: $ | LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 0. #69502
  • Call 'Type.GetType' after 'Assembly.LoadFrom' throw 'System.IO.FileLoadException' #69596
  • [H/3] stress not running #67442
    7.0.0
  • Enable running analyzers on `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration` project #69522
  • The dead thread reported in ICorProfilerInfo4::EnumThreads #60566
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfiler EventPipe callbacks do not properly increment/decrement the evacuation counters #60081
    7.0.0
  • IsStructMarshalable fails on C# arrays and fixed arrays with explicit bounds and attributes #58305
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Buffer.ZeroMemory(void*, nuint) #63547
    7.0.0
  • Enable running analyzers on `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` project #69521
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientTest.GetContentAsync_WhenCanNotConnect_ExceptionContainsHostInfo #66692
    7.0.0
  • TcpClient.Connect throws NRE if the Socket is cleared #69493
    7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shrx, sarx, shlx where needed #41881
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove destructors #69628
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Updating to a version of Roslyn that contains the NumericIntPtr feature #69627
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Better createdump error messages #69626
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Dispose of processes launched in host tests #69625
    test-bug, area-Host
  • Range check cleanups and optimizations; improve assertion messages #69624
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix IsSupported guard check for use of Ssse3.Shuffle in Span.Reverse #69623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use a better endpoint for backport workflows runs #69617
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Don't fail the CI job if Firefox tests fail in `runtime-wasm` #69615
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ILogWriter interface to ilc and crossgen #69609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support optional client certificates for MsQuicConnection #69603
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Draft Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix native sourcelink support #69598
  • Update NoTargets SDK and clean-up code #69597
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use CanCreateSymbolicLinks instead of IsSymLinkSupported #69592
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [wasm] CI build improvements #69519
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactoring which numeric interface exposes which methods to match latest API review decisions #69582
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use span to pass type modifiers in RuntimeTypeHandle.GetTypeHelper #69425
    community-contribution
  • ZipFile UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes test fails on Apple OSes #69583
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] improve memory access and marshaling range checks #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix HTTP3 stress #69182
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable analyzers for System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #69581
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Change location where we output message about notification profilers being disabled #69538
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • avoid pulling Ssl internals to other assemblies #69539
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • Add NativeMemory.ZeroMemory API #69500
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable analyzers for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #69579
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix GetContentAsync_ErrorStatusCode_ExpectedExceptionThrown test #69228
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • make sure socket is intialized before connecting TCPClient #69540
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Move dead code removal in lower after last updategraph #69421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Correct the behavior of Equals #69499
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Allow ZipArchive to create duplicate entries #69524
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Add coop GC transitions to various EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE functions; define to noop if no threads #69515
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute to SafeDeleteSslContext.ReadFromConnection/WriteToConnection methods #69507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Added `--git_diff` option SPMI asm diffs #69572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compiling C# CLI tool to WASM: Cross-OS native compilation is not supported #1890

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Dotnet.Compatibility analyzer doesn't work with the NumericIntPtr feature #25566
  • [API Compat] add triple slash comments on all rules #25565
  • unify error message style across rules #25564
  • Migrate Razor SDK to razor-compiler #25561
  • "Permission denied" when running `dotnet script` if the current working directory contains a file named `dotnet` #25551

Closed

  • CoreCLR failed to build with error NETSDK1182 with MSVC on windows amd64. #25005
  • How to let MSBuildLocator.RegisterDefaults find a local SDK installation (not on PATH) #24691
  • --runtime or --use-current-runtime with --sc or --selfcontained gives warning warning NETSDK1179: One of '--self-contained' or '--no-self -contained' options are required when '--runtime' is used. #25300

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1782315 #25567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove format command options #25562
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25526
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove dotnet-format option parsing and have them pass-through. #25541
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add rule to make sure enum values match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Fixes an infinite loop of reloads when the process fails to start #25533
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Updates the request path to always be host relative #25534
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support pull mode in the DefaultDiagnosticAnalyzerService #61442
  • Partial doesn't trigger soft select in override completion #61439
  • Necessary imports should be added when inlineHints are applied #61438
  • Required Members VB Support #61435
    C# 11.0
  • .editorconfig and Code Cleanup issue with Visual Studio 2022 v17.2.1 #61434
  • IDE0055 (Fix formatting) errors after upgrading to SDK 6.0.300 #61433
  • [VB.NET] CStr(CUInt(1.5)) is not redundant conversion #61429
  • Opening the interactive window hits debug assertion in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore #61426

Closed

  • Incorrect code analysis: IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a vlue to 'variable' #61347
    Backlog
  • [Bug] 'ref this' argument in a structure isn't work when translate to VB.net. #61374
  • Nuget Exception while running Unit Testing example for Source Generator Testing #61432

PullRequests

Created

  • Add file paths to interactive buffers and documents to support LSP requests #61441
    Area-IDE, Area-Interactive, LSP
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Address prototype comments #61436
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow source link, embedded or decompiled source in Peek Definition #61427
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge "Default Interface Implementation of static members" feature into 'main' #61437
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • More instrumentation for ReferenceCachingCS #61402
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge "numeric IntPtr" feature #61428
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add FixAll support for UseExpressionBody/BlockBody refactoring #61240
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix binding for checkbox text in rename dialogs #61430
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Address feedback from numeric IntPtr feature review #61418
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test
  • [LSP] Small cleanup for pull diagnostics logging #61417
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid logging work when no logger is specified #61423
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • [LSP] Disable sln crawler diagnostics when LSP pull is enabled #61396
    Area-IDE
  • Add the fix all provider for fixing all naming violation to feature branch #59726
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove parameter nullchecking feature #61397
    Area-Compilers
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update SDK to .NET 7 Preview 4 #61422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Move Static Members: Existing type #56131
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API] Add client result support to Java client #41777
  • dotnet watch on macOS throws error looking for exe #41776
  • Null results not handled correctly in Java client #41775
  • EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider Misses Route Parameters #41773
  • [dotnet-watch] Experience improvements for injecting the scripts into the document #41772
  • HTTP Error 503.0 - Server has been shutdown The service is unavailable. Most likely causes: An invalid identity in the application pool could cause this error. The application pool is no longer running because of configuration or reaching application failure limits. The concurrent application request limit was reached. #41771
  • IIS In Process aspnetcore process failing to start under load #41770
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Trimming] MVC #41767
  • [Trimming] Localization #41766

Closed

  • With "Do not use top-level statements" checked, in Blazor WebAssembly App/ Blazor Server App/gRPC, the namespace is "Company.WebApplication1" rather than the solution name. #41529
    6.0.x
  • Backport template fixes to 6.0.xxx #41519
    6.0.x
  • Integer Overflow Causing HTTP1 Connections to Fail in Kestrel #41756
    7.0-preview5
  • Allow specifying authentication schemes where anti-forgery checks are (not) required #41759
  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • define an interface for HubConnectionContext for signalR #41709
  • Move Rate Liming Abstractions/APIs to dotnet/runtime #37385
    7.0-preview4
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #38267
    6.0.x
  • Component Governance alerts of eventsource for signalr package in npm #41729
  • TaskResultExecutor is never used by ActionMethodExecutor #40364
    7.0-preview4
  • css isolation compiler warnings for incorrect css syntax #41751
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #40525
    7.0-preview5
  • [.Net 6.0] Sampler does not receive the correct ParentId when enabling ActivitySource listener for `Microsoft.AspNetCore` #37471
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Caching StackExchangeRedis throws exception when using Twemproxy #41320
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor Server execption on publish after updating to .net 7 #41712

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove outdated comments HostingApplicationDiagnostics #41778
    area-runtime
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix client results with Hub<T> IHubContext #41763
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix Integer Overflow in Header Processing #41757
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 7.0-preview5
  • fix allocation issue caused by ordering of MVC result executors for Task results #41108
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview5
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
  • Make SignalR Redis test thread-safe #41564
    area-signalr
  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Grid Auto height based on Images #7388
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Windows Platform All Visual Assets #7387
  • ListView and CollectionView do not scroll in a VerticalStackLayout #7386
  • Hot Restart (iOS) doesn't succeed with local device #7384
  • Databinding FontImageSource.Glyph doesn't update #7383
  • Changing ListView to CollectionView gives an "invalid cast" exception deep in Xamarin.Android #7382
  • Create Design Docs and Specs for how users should/can handle Handler Life Cycle #7381
  • BlazorWebView for WinUI 3 #7380
  • Full Screen in Windows Platform #7378
  • Button IsEnabled property in Windows Platform #7377
  • ContentPage > BackgroundColor attribute not working on Windows #7376
  • ScrollView not auto resizing #7374
  • [iOS] Grid cannot be scrolled properly in a scroll view #7373
  • [Android] Soft Input Resize doesn't properly resize #7369
    6.0.3xx-sr2
  • Ship my Xamarin.UITest to work with MAUI framework #7368
  • MaximumWidthRequest property behaves differently in Windows and Android #7366
  • Label with multispan formatted text breaks on Android when using HorizontalTextAlignment #7365
  • Equivalent of WPF Style.Resources? #7364
  • Label cut-off inside Grid with multiple *-columns #7363
  • [iOS] Localisation not working #7362
  • WinUI Touch keyboard does not open on Windows 10 (Tablet mode) #7361
  • ShellApp fills the whole app on MacOS Monterey #7360
  • Net Maui Blazor App cannot pair to a mac #7359
  • [Android] FontImageSource.Size property not working in ToolbarItem #7357
  • Drag page to Dismiss #7355
  • Call Dispose() on Page and ViewModel when the page is popped if they implement IDisposable #7354
  • MAUI project requires bin/obj folders removed for any MacOS build following a successful one #7353
  • CheckBox has default (empty) padding on Windows platform (Mac has no padding) #7352
    6.0.3xx-sr1

Closed

  • Grid does not reduce height request. #7298
  • [WinUI] Fix FlyoutPage tests #7306
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Blazor MAUI dynamic root components fail on iOS hardware #6965
    6.0.300
  • Camera access after Blazor Hybrid Android removal of the `GetWebChromeClient` API #6565
    Future
  • [Bug] [Android] Navigating SemanticHeadings alters Button sizes #3118
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Release configuration crash on Android (Invalid IL code, NavigationViewHandler) #7367
  • Stepper on Android #7314
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Border has no Background on Android, iOS is fine #7356
  • Icon #7291

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the padding around checkboxes #7379
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs (Android only edition) #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7370
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix some naming cells #7302
    area/layout 🔲
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220520222141214 to loc #7385
  • Create Window Specific Orientation Extensions #7338
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Scoping doc #4679
  • [Android] Fix Stepper sizing #7327
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Updated

  • Fix RTL in AbsoluteLayout #7309
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Fix BlazorWebView disposal #7349
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Don't clear old images. Fixes #6625 #7348
    area/image :framed_picture:, control-image, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Injecting into group by projection should check for distinct #28071
  • EF Core 6 fails to detect specified discriminator #28069
  • Query: Curious case of single result but no limit #28067
    MQ
  • Using DbCommand with TransactionScope on an open connection does not create an active transaction. #28066
  • Unexpected cycles detected by `BatchingTopologicalSort` in latest preview #28065

Closed

  • MissingMethod on CreateModel: 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IColumnMapping> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IColumn.get_PropertyMappings()' #28042
  • Development of the Include Delegate #28021

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Don't add grouping key to projection when Distinct is applied #28072
    auto-merge
  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
  • Query: Assign correct type/typemapping to result of Round on SqlServer #28068
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Add more cast nodes in multi-line breaks during migrations #28064
    auto-merge
